Name: Zoning, 49-39 Van Dam Street Demapping, Queens (C 220305 MMQ)
Title: Application number C 220305 MMQ (49-39 Van Dam Street Demapping) submitted by JPB Realty Co., LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 of the New York City Charter and Section 5-430 et seq. of the New York City Administrative Code for an amendment to the City Map involving: the elimination, discontinuance and closing of a portion of Gale Avenue and the adjustment of grades and block dimensions necessitated thereby, including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map No. 5041 dated April 25, 2024 and signed by the Borough President, Borough of Queens, Community District 2, Council District 26.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
